name: Dragon Art: Reaving Roar
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You unleash the echo of a mighty roar that rumbles through a 60 foot long, 15 foot wide, 15 foot tall line. Every creature you choose within the area becomes frightened until the end of your next turn, and must succeed on an Intuition saving throw or take 6d6 psychic damage, halved on a success.

You can't cast this spell unless it is from a ninja scroll.
empower: Creatures that fail their saving throw and are frightened immediately use all their movement at the start of their next turn to flee from you.
